@metadata.name: string
@metadata.comment: The library is imported as default, it is "implied", and can be fully identified by the library prefix.

mw.ustring 001.description:
mw.ustring.byte( s, i[, j] )
 s - string used as source
 i - start index
 j - end index

mw.ustring 002.description:
mw.ustring.char( ... )
 s - chars to be converted and concatenated
